variants.description: Mutations in the a-synuclein gene identified in families with Parkinson’s disease.
Hereditary parkinsonism with dementia is caused by mutations in ATP13A2.
Mutations in DJ-1 are rare in familial Parkinson disease.
Mutations in LRRK2 cause autosomal-dominant parkinsonism with pleomorphic pathology.
Hereditary early-onset Parkinson’s disease caused by mutations in PINK1.
